  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Package arrived at hazmat cage during sunrise sort in a plastic bin. Inspection showed package to be wet, torn open, and 1 of 4 items have a loose cap. Damage most likely caused from being dropped or mishandled during loading process. Remaining contents will be returned to shipper in a salvage drum, unless otherwise stated.

item.title: Report X-2024040961
item.description:
Report X-2024040961

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-25T15:11:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-15
  • City: PARSIPPANY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDED TO AN AIR PACKAGE THAT WAS COLD TO THE TOUCH. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED APPROXIMATELY FOUR POUNDS OF DRY ICE COOLING FOOD. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX TO INDICATE DRY ICE WAS BEING SHIPPED. OUTER BOX IS PREPRINTED RUSH, PERISHABLE, INSULATED WITH UP ARROWS. THERE IS A YELLOW THERM-0-CHILL OVERNITE SHIPPERS LABEL APPLIED. INNER STYROFOAM BOX HAS A WARNING DRY ICE - DO NOT TOUCH WITH BARE HANDS LABEL AFFIXED. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2024040973
item.description:
Report X-2024040973

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-23T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-11
  • City: KEASBEY
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DURING THE OVERNIGHT SORT THE PACKAGE ARRIVED AT THE HAZMAT CAGE SHOWING OBVIOUS SIGNS OF INTERNAL LEAKAGE. UPON INSPECTION ONE BOTTLE OF FOUR BOTTLES OF NOBLE DEGREASER HD WAS FOUND FULLY LEAKED OUT. THE REMAINING CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A SALVAGE DRUM TO BE RETURN TO SHIPPER UNLESS OTHERWISE. DescribePack: FAILURE OF NOBLE DEGREASER HD COULD CAUSE FROM THE PACKAGE BEING MISHANDLED OR DROPPED DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: CONTENTS WERE PLACED IN A LINED SALVAGE DRUM TO AWAIT DISPOSITION.

item.title: Report X-2024040858
item.description:

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package arrived at hazmat during sunrise sort in a plastic bin. DescribePack: Inspection showed entire package missing except for the torn label, with 2 of 4 items missing, and 2 of 4 items with loose caps. Damage most likely caused from being placed on wrong conveyor belt. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Remaining contents will be disposed of because they are damaged from leakage.
